title: JavaScript for Beginners
description: This course is designed for absolute beginners who want to learn JavaScript from scratch. It covers basic programming concepts along with practical exercises to reinforce learning.
format: Video lectures, quizzes, and coding exercises.

title: React.js Fundamentals
description: This course dives deep into React.js fundamentals, covering topics such as component-based architecture, state management, and hooks. Suitable for developers looking to enhance their frontend skills with React.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
format: Video lectures, quizzes, coding assignments, and a final project.

title: Mastering MongoDB
description: This advanced course covers MongoDB in depth, including advanced querying techniques, indexing, and performance optimization. Ideal for developers and database administrators looking to master MongoDB.
prerequisites: Prior experience with MongoDB and database concepts.
format: Video lectures, hands-on exercises, and case studies.

title: CSS Essentials
description: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to CSS, covering selectors, layout techniques, and responsive design. Perfect for beginners looking to master CSS for web development.
format: Video lectures, interactive exercises, and quizzes.

title: Node.js in Practice
description: Learn how to build robust and scalable web applications using Node.js. This course covers asynchronous programming, Express.js, MongoDB integration, and more.
prerequisites: Familiarity with JavaScript and web development concepts.

title: Advanced CSS Layouts
description: Take your CSS skills to the next level with this advanced course on modern CSS layouts. Learn Flexbox, Grid, and responsive design techniques to create complex and dynamic layouts.

title: MongoDB for Beginners
description: Get started with MongoDB and learn how to store, retrieve, and manipulate data using this popular NoSQL database. Perfect for beginners looking to dive into database management.
